list_definition.definition: something or someone that produces an effect or result

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Having no money is the cause of all my misery.

list_definition.definition: a reason for an action; a motive

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: You had no cause to treat your wife so badly.

list_definition.definition: an aim or concern for which an individual or group works

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: cancer research and other deserving causes
We took this decision in the cause of peace.

list_definition.definition: to make (something) happen; to bring about; to be the means of

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He caused me to drop my suitcase.
